overview: Learn the specific patterns of stars in the night sky. In compelling, easy to understand animations, you'll be able to decode the constellations and other important celestial bodies. Ancient astronomers described how constellations might appear in different seasons in various parts of the World.Discover how many of the constellations, such as Orion, Leo, Taurus Sagittarius were named.
title: Night Sky - Navigating the Constellations
